markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Flying Kick](/Feats.aspx?ID=445) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 160 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You launch yourself at a foe. Make a Leap or attempt a High Jump or Long Jump. At the end of the jump, if you’re adjacent to a foe, you can immediately Strike that foe with an unarmed attack, even if the foe is in mid-air. You fall to the ground after the Strike. If the distance you fall is no more than the height of your jump, you land upright and take no damage.
name: Flying Kick

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 4" pfs="Standard" > Flying Kick Two Actions Source Core Rulebook pg. 160 4.0 --- You launch yourself at a foe. Make a Leap or attempt a High Jump or Long Jump. If the distance you fall is no more than the height of your jump, you land upright and take no damage.
